Text:
Thanx for all the Classroom in a book editions. only 1 question, where can i find the cd stuff of Indesign?

Keep up the good work.

Same question as his! I even registered the book and was willing to pay for the data files, but can't find them anywhere--the book is pretty useless without the data files. Usually when i down load a book that has data files it has been included in the download.
